name: Date Simulator
description:
Arthur Edison is, by all counts, a loser. However, he is a loser that managed to land a date. He’s been so nervous about it that his friends have gotten concerned, so they decide to try to both cheer him up and prepare him for his impending romantic encounter simultaneously - by going on pretend dates with him! Problem is, they’re all losers too, so the chance of such a plan being effective is questionable at best. Join Arthur and friends as they do their best to give each other advice on a topic they know absolutely nothing about!

This game is another one on the shorter side, probably taking under an hour to 100%, so if that’s your preference then perhaps you’ll enjoy it! It’s also mostly writing and low on mechanics, so take that into consideration before giving it a try. Either way, I hope you enjoy it! And as always, thank you for playing!

Sound effects provided by FreeSound.org and created with ChipTone.
